name: Teke Teke - テケテケ
description:
Developed by 2 people, our aim was to give life to the famous urban legend, there are quite a few variations of the story and we had to combine them in order to deliver the perfect Teke Teke experience.

Key Features

  • Multiple Endings
  • Stealth Based
  • Item Combinations
  • Extremely Intelligent enemy AI
  • Japanese Voice Acting (日本の声優)

Every decision you make in the game has a meaningful impact (multiple endings), you can use and combine items to help you during your adventure.


Summary:

The main character is a high school girl, your best friend (and crush) stopped coming to school, it has been days since you've heard back from him, you remember that before his dissapearing he told you about a legend, the Teke Teke legend, at the time you didn't think much of it, but he seemed almost obsessed with that story, you finally decide to visit him one day after school.

Teke Teke - テケテケ
One cold winter day, a woman was hit by an ongoing
train, which sliced her in two at the waist. Lying in the cold,
she died a horrific death.

Those who hear this story are visited within three days
by a legless woman and viciously murdered.

You will hear her crawling toward you:

"Teke teke teke.."
